text:
Youth League
Youth League: PSG virtually eliminated
Largely beaten by Bruges this afternoon, Paris Saint-Germain is almost eliminated from the Youth League.
06 Nov 2019, 16:41 by Florian Sermaise
At the edge of the chasm. Upgraded this afternoon by Bruges (0-4), Paris Saint-Germain is almost eliminated from the Youth League. At the Camp des Loges, and on the occasion of the fourth day of the group stage, the young Parisians did not weigh very heavy, deprived in particular of Lo√Øc Mbe Soh, touched in the thigh, and four players left to the World Cup U17 in Brazil (Kouassi, Kalimuendo, Pemb√©l√© and Aouchiche).




Barragiste, at best




Arnaud Muinga + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

A double of Aelterman (12th, 54th), a direct free kick of De Cuyper (62nd) and a last goal of Ochieng (85th) put the PSG in the embarrassment this Wednesday. From now on, the club the capital points to the 3rd place of the six-point pool of the Belgian club and Real Madrid, which currently receives Galatasaray, and has no chance to finish first. At best, the Parisians can hope for a competition of circumstance allowing them to hang a place of barrage.
